eddy.lang.analysis

Class Extension

  • java.lang.Object
    • eddy.lang.parser.Compilation
      • eddy.lang.analysis.Extension

  • public class Extension
extends Compilation
    Describes the itemized Action interpretations for all Rule in a Policy. The extension is computed using the ExtensionCalculator.
    Author:
    Travis Breaux
